content.detailedDescription: There are at leaste twenty ufos hovering in the sky over me they seem to move with me "very strange" is there anyone who can try to explain what the f#*!* is going on
content.summary: At leaste 20 bright orbs hover in the sky over me

content.detailedDescription: I was a boy scout [troop 4- st. gabriels church st.Louis missouri} camping at s-bar-f camp in knob lick missouri, we stayed for a week, and on the third or fourth day we took canoes across sims lake to a beach where we spent the night. we had no tents, and layed on the beach to sleep. there were no lights, and it seemed like every star in the sky could be seen. i saw a very faint light moving across the sky, about the same brightness as a star. i pointed the light out to other kids until they saw it, then it stopped for several minutes, then it broke into two lights and moved away from each other like a y from the original line. by this time, most of the kids saw this, and we watched them until they could not be seen anymore. that's it. we also had daily f-15 flights at super-sonic speeds at very low altitudes above the lake, so low the sonic boom would leave ripples in the water. we would canoe out to the middle of the lake, and wait for them to fly by. ask anyone who went to s-f boy scout camp in the mid 1970's.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: One object moving across a star lit sky in a line. stopped. then out of one, two moved in different directions

content.shape: Boomerang,  Bullet,  Missile,  Diamond,  Disc,  Egg,  Sphere,  Star-like
content.summary: You must see this...It's been occuring for the past 2 yrs nightly, weather permitting.

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading to my sister in laws house passing lakehurst navel air station when straight ahead of me in the good distance a large glowing orb appeared within view to another large plane in the distance ( thats how i could judge the size )
then 5 lights that i thought were flairs shot straight out equal distance south east of the object held in place for 5 seconds then recoiled back to the object as evenly as they came out, then it quickly faded out of sight.
i pulled the car over and watched then it appeared again to the left of where i saw it nothing came out then 3 seconds later faded out of sight.
content.summary: Glowing orb size of a plane south of lakehurst that 5 smaller shot out of the craft then retracted.
Black triangle flies silently above building on ucboulder campus

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard.I was looking for any satellites.I thought this was super weird.These object move in the sky with me it is very very strange they are there any night there are no clouds it is the most strange thing i think anyone has ever seen.I stay away from almost everyone i am very scared.I lost sight of the object when i finally fell asleap
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: There are a leaste twenty of these things and they follow me wherever i go

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a smoke and i looked up and saw 2 jets flying from the se to nw i looked out ahead of them and saw a circular object burnt orange in color not blinking but a solid color it was flying away from the jets i soon realized that they were chasing this object after about 3 minuets the lead jet caught up to the object  and  at that time the object dissappered idont know what happened to it it was very strange it was there one second and gone the next the 2 jets conitunied on  the nw and dissappeared
content.summary: It was a burnt orange color

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were walking from our flat on dover road to the off license on the strand (just round the corner).  there was a person in front of us and it was a quiet evening.  we'd popped out for a bar of chocolate each.  we crossed the road and the person in front of us walked around the corner and out of sight to us.  someone else on the other side disappeared down liverpool road and the road went very quiet which was unusual for the busy main road into deal town.  it was six in the evening.  i turned round to look behind us because it was so quiet and it was a long road into the distance behind us which stretched up an incline in the distance but there were no cars and we found ourselves alone.  then i noticed three lights in an equilateral triangle as i viewed it (not tilted from my perspective) move steadily and silently from above the roof tops over our flat and i said to my son 'hey look!' at first he didn't but i said 'look quick!  what's that?' and we both saw it as it slid slowly and steadily and silently (it was silent because there were no cars or people anywhere anymore) quite low down in the sky.  it would have needed a grapefruit held at arms length to have covered the lights in a triangle.  yellow on top, green to the left, and red at the bottom.  i said 'wouldn't it be funny if it was a ufo?' and giggled but frowned too as it struck me as very peculiar but as i was with my son i didn't take it seriously. as it passed us the bottom light reflected off the slate tiled roof of the first house on the strand.  so i knew it was tangible.  as soon as it disappeared someone walked from the strand onto dover road towards us adn as i looked behind us the line of traffic the headlights in a row all began descending the incline of the road in the distance.  i said to jack 'shall we run and see it along the houses?' but we both decided not to as it would have disappeared by the time we'd run along the road and got onto the beach.  i asked my son to describe and draw what he'd seen separately to me and we compared later.  we both saw the same thing and our drawings were the same. we moved house since and don't know where they are but it stuck in our memories and we still talk about it now.
content.summary: Three coloured lights.  top one yellow.  right one green.  bottom light red.  equilateral triangle to my view.  no slant in perspective.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work on the night shift, when i went outside to get something out of my car,as i was leaving my car i heard this chug chug noise like a train at the same time there was a humming noise, i thought it sounded nearby so i stood there for a few seconds and looked around, the noise got louder and i was looking in the direction of the noise when i noticed a dark cloud going overhead aprox 125 ft. the cloud was almost the same color as the sky behind it,but you could see the outline of it, it was aprox 75 to 100 foot long moving at aprox 10 miles an hour, it was only in my sights for about 35 seconds ,the noise i heard for close to 3 minutes,my first reaction was to call someone(the police) but i talked myself out of it as i thought they would think i was nuts,so i told myself to forget all about it, and i did! which is what bothered me the most because i dont remeber what made me recall the whole incident,almost two years later, its hard for me to believe i would not tell someone right away, when i finally talked about the whole thing i did get a few people laughing at me, im not nuts or making this up.
content.summary: Sounded like a train and a humming noise, appeared to be cloaked in a dark cloud overhead about 125 feet moving slowly out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
8 feb 06, 1250 hrs, mcalester army ammunition plant, outfield secure area, next to the container outload facility, i often watch the aircraft,jetstreams, of the plains comming out of dfw airport 175 miles to the south,
as i looked overhead i observed two disc shaped objects,
traveling north in formation, the right/lead and the left
at the 8-o-clock position, their altitude when i first saw
them was approx. a quater at arms length, when last seen, a nickle at the 2-o-clock high position, the center section
of the disc's were redish/rust color with a gray/bluegray
outer edge, i didn't know they came in multicolors?.
the duration of the observation was one minute fourtyfive
seconds, when last seen the right/lead object rose stright
up into a cloud and then the second, his wingman did the same, these were no convential aircraft, x- oh-6 pilot,
air observer scout 101st ab, 5th special forces group, recon. needless to say we can have no cameras where i work,
i guess i could draw them but not using computer graphics.
i have seen smaller silvery objects tailing jet's  on two
other times, one did a 180 and rose up when another aircraft came out of the clouds.
content.summary: I observed two disc shaped objects traveling due north in formation, the right lead, and the #2 in the eight-o-clock, traveling from overhead  to the two -o-clock position  at which time the right and then the left  rose into a cloud.

content.detailedDescription: This event happened when i was about 12 years old. the event has stuck in my head and still remains fresh as if it happened yesterday. i was at my home walking up the back stairs and usually just glance outside the windows as i walk up the stairs. i remember there was snow on the ground and then there was this flash of light. a few seconds after this flash i saw a light red, pinkish color illuminate the sky. i remember thinking to myself that it was similar to the terminator 2 movie where there was a nuclear explosion. i got really scared and thought it was the end of the world. after staring at the sky for 15 seconds or so the lights disappered. i explained what i had seen to my parents and to some friends and i got the explanation that it was a transformer that had exploded or someone had shot off a roman candle. i never really accepted the fact that it was either of those things as the light lit up the whole sky - something that neither of those 2 things could have done. recently i did some research and found out there had been a suspected ufo crash on long island on that date i nearly had a heart attack. i went onto google maps and found my home and then drew a line from the spot where i had seen the light emerge. the line extended almost exactly to brookhaven labs - the spot where the crash was reported. i did not see any type of craft or anything just the strange lights and what seemed like an explosion. i will agree with some of the reports that something did crash near brookhaven labs just not sure as to what it was.
content.summary: Observed a flash and then a white/pinkish explosion that lit up the sky

content.detailedDescription:
We were attending a neil diamond concert hot august nights
at the greek theaterb in hollywood  an outdoor ampitheatre
it was a soldout audience thousands of people were there
neil diamond was singing is song  heartlight  they were flashing lazer beams in the air in front of the stage
i then saw people looking up and pointing i looked up
about 200 or 300 ft above the stage was a large disc with 
varius colored lights the lights they were diffused and they were moving in waves blending with each other at first i thought it was part of the show then it slowly started
acsending straight up every body was ooing and ahing it picked up speed and after a couple of minutes was out of sight   the press was there and taking pictures  it was being video taped for commercial production someone must have gotten pictures audiences are not to bring cameras to concerts  i think this sighting could easily be investigated by mufon   jim mcguire
content.summary: Disc shaped

content.detailedDescription:
Came home from night shift.  sitting in the southeast sky was an oval bright light at around 15,000 ft.  it would move erratically in a small area, then settle.  looking from the northwest there are always planes coming in and out of sky harbor.  there were no planes flying in the sky at all for a two hour time period.  as the sky became lighter the globe has moved up around 30,000 feet.  as of 7:15am there are no planes flying in the sky.

we have seen similar objects at different times of the day and night.
content.summary: Sitting in sky for hours.  no planes flying as they usually do in this spot in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
i submitted this when it happened, but i thought i could clarify it.  i still remember like it was yesterday.
   i had known about ufos and wanted to believe but i was not sure if they existed.
   so anyway on july 18, 2003 it just turned to the 18th from the 17th and it was 12:45 am.  i was at my parent's house and they live in coshocton, oh.  i went out the door to smoke a cigarette and a strange feeling told me to turn around and look up.  i looked up and was just frozen for a second.  a orange boomerang object with a center "stalk" that seemed seperate from the "wings" by the smallest amount possible.  it seemed high up but i could see details.  it moved in an arc about like from the tip of my thumb to the tip of my index finger at an arm's length.  it was almost as large as the average size moon. so it moved fast, i don't remember exactly how fast but pretty fast.  and its movement was smooth but jerky.  what i mean is it almost looked like it was stuttering but it was moving fluidly (if that makes sense). so this lasted all of 5-10 seconds.          
     then suddenly right behind it, following it almost, an orange "star" that moved so fast it left a tracer.  it did not go in a straight line but the motion was a lot more streamlined than the "boomerang".  as soon as it appeared then streaked across then disappeared, or during that cycle, another appeared and did likewise. this just continued in very fast repitition over and over.  this all happened so fast it made me a little dizzy and i couldn't tell how many were visible at once.  it is hard to even estimate the total.  they would change direction at very high speed.  not sharp turns but curved turns that were so smooth and graceful that it was very awesome.  they also displayed extreme acceleration and deceleration
     their paths were a similar distance to the "boomerang" (thumbpoint to fingertip at arms length).
they all started and ended in different places in the sky, but this all occured over the same patch of sky.  so they were going everywhich way over the same area.
   this continued for about five minutes and i finally snapped out of my shock. i realized everyone was sleeping by this point, but my sister in college would be up. i ran in and grabbed the phone and was back in 5 seconds.  i called her and told her and she believed me, but what could she do or say?  so i hung up and kept watching.  this whole time i had a feeling i would miss something.
     i had tried to go around the side of the house to get a different perspective but i lost sight of them and ran back to the original spot and just continued watching from there. so after what seemed like ten minutes, i realized i could run in and get either mom or dad up and back out and not miss much. so i ran in yelled "blah blah come immediately" and ran back out and my dad was "quickly" behind me. a white light similar to the orange ones, which had stopped in the time i was inside, streaked from east to west across the sky.  my dad was half asleep still and very cranky. i said "see that!" he said "no." 
     it happened again i said "see it that time" and he did but i don't think it registered and tried to say it was a bird so i gave up on him.  now my mom had gotten out there but it was over.  i talked to them for a second and at some point in the area where the orange lights were (north) a thick white column of "smoke" appeared to have risen from the horizon up into the sky.  like the space shuttle blasted off from cape canaveral.  it was all very strange.  my parents went back to sleep and my dad doesn't totally remember. to this day he probably only remembers because i ask him.  he admits to seeing something, who knows what he remembers.
     the main thing is one year later almost to the hour(very late july 17th 2004) my grandpa of 80-some years died.  he was a very good catholic and gave a lot of money to good causes and was a member of a lot of organizations and such and is one of the best catholics i have ever known.  married to his wife for 50-some years.  the preacher came over to the house on his funeral.  i really beleive it had something to do with that.  
     when i was seeing this i was thinking "what does it mean?" and something inside me kept telling me "change"

1.See above
2.Stood out
3.Bizzare
4.See above
5.The whole spectrum of emotions
6.Went in house, then just stopped
content.summary: Ufos in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from work and was northbound on i-25. off to the west, i could see four bright yellow lights that appeared to be a few thousand feet off the ground. i turned off at exit 108 and parked my vehicle on the side of the road. the four lights moved independent of each other. one light rose very high in the sky in a very short amount of time (less than ten seconds) before fading out. the other three lights moved across the sky staying probably a few thousand feet off the ground. they moved from south to north and then appeared to move towards the west as they grew dimmer. they then each rose very quickly into the sky and faded out much like the first one. after looking at a map, i would estimate that i was about six miles to the southeast from the boundries of fort carson and i would put the lights at about ten to fifeteen miles away. they were very bright, but not extremely large. i would compare their size to that of a light on cell phone towers at a distance of about five miles.
content.summary: Bright yellow lights dancing in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room about to go to bed. i had just closed my eyes when i opened them and looked at the window. thats when i saw the object.At first i thought it was a plane but then i realized that it was flying in a direction that planes in the area did not. it was also flying extremely low to the ground. it was noticed at the left side of the window and moved quickly to the right.The lights slowly pulsated on and off but the light never fully went away it would only get soft. i watched until it disappeared off the right side of the window then i ran to tell my mom.
content.summary: 2 red pulsating lights seen flying in front of house

content.detailedDescription:
I've seen these lights 5 or 6 times since november so i really wanted to get them on video after taking some still photos several days earlier.  there are almost always two lights that move on perfectly parallel courses.  after a couple minutes one drops what looks like a flare of the same color that falls straight down.  another one usually follows after that but i cannot remember seeing more than two nor have i ever seen them come from both objects.  one time (see the photo, dated febuary 6th) the flare itself seemed to actually split in two.  there was a brief flash when it did, but nothing very bright.

as for the february 10th encounter, i first noticed the objects to my southeast moving west at lower altitude than i usually saw.  this was very different and they also seemed to be moving much faster than usual.  i'm assuming this means they were much closer than before.  all of the times i saw them before they were moving southeast to north and 30-45 degrees up from my point of view.  this was maybe 10 degrees at the most.  they were so much lower than before that they were obscured by some trees i have to my south.  however, the objects changed course while out of view and started heading up at what looked to me like a perfect 45 degree angle.  

when the first flare dropped the lead object seemed to stop moving and slowly fade out.  it would start to dim and then pulse back a little brighter but at a lower intensity than before.  the second object changed course between the time of the first and second flares and seemed to level off its altitude.  the strange thing is the remaining object seemed to just disappear as i looked away to move my camera.  as silly as it sounds the remaining object in almost all the cases i've seen them seemed to just vanish if i looked away for a split second after it was done dropping flares or whatever they are.  there doesn't seem to be any missing time involved.  my backyard is fairly large and i've had the porch light on every time.  it seems like if there was concern about people seeing whatever they are the man standing in the middle of a lit yard would be more of an issue than that same man seeing the last object fade away.

i attached the photo, dated february 6th, to help explain things.  it was taken with a nikon d70 on a 30 second exposure time.  oddly enough, the "flares" don't seem to be dropping straight down in that case.  the video itself, unfortunately, isn't all i had hoped it would be.  it doesn't show the colors and in my haste i forgot to turn off the autofocus so it has problems there.  it was on a tripod and was not moved during the clip.

i've been thinking about it for quite awhile now and i really can't come up with any sort of explanation for what these are.  i've searched the archives at nuforc.Org for sightings that matched mine and came up with a lot of results, especially in california.  there was even one that mentioned the lights being on top of craft that were cross shaped but i have no way of verifying that since i can only see the lights.  there was even one in the uk fairly recently.  why they don't seem to be getting any sort of attention i don't know, but with so many similar sightings there has to be some connection.  

the earliest sighting i've had was 8:30 p.M. and the latest is about 2 a.M.  during the sightings i've never had any sense of fear but was pretty much just in awe.  after they go away i start to doubt i saw them in the first place but i'm guessing that's a pretty typical reaction to this sort of thing.
content.summary: Recurring.  two orange lights parallel course.  one drops 2 orange lights of same color straight down before both original lights fade out.

content.detailedDescription:
My mother was visiting captiva island in the gulf.  she and her boyfriend were walking and she took a picture of some trees. they didn't see anything but when she looked at the picture the strange object appeared in the frame.  she took the picture with a digital camera she has had for about a year.  no other pictures had any strange objects.  they all came out fine.  she took other pictures on the walk but i couldn't see anything on any other photo they took that day.  the first photo is the original and the other two are of the photo zoomed in closer.  in between the two smallest circles you can make out several dots.  
   i don't if it's a ufo, a camera problem or something natraul but it looks very strange to everyone who sees it. thanks for your time and feel free to contact me .
content.summary: A picture my mother took

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting my parents in greenwood, s.C. over thanksgiving. the friday after the holiday, the three of us drove to the nearest city, greenville, to do some christmas shopping and to see a movie.

greenwood is a small city in a rural part of upstate south carolina, and the part of highway 25 we were on is fairly isolated. there are a few homes here and there, but not a lot of development. consequently, the road is quiet and on a clear night like the one in question, the stars are clearly visible. 

around 10:30 or 11 p.M., i pointed out to my dad that the star on the horizon was particularly clear and beautiful, and he looked and said that while it was very pretty, he thought it was a planet because it looked too bright and large to be a star. my mom said that whatever it was, it looked awfully weird. the closer we got, the stranger it looked. i suggested that it might be a cell phone tower, and my dad disagreed, because the light on a cell phone tower would be red, and this light was white, like a star. that's when i realized that the object had changed positions in the sky. it had moved from the right side of the sky -- the passenger side, based on my position in the car -- to the left side of the sky, and it was definitely getting larger and closer.

it's difficult for me to estimate how many miles we drove until it was directly overhead, but curiosity got the better of us in the little town of ware shoals, which is about 20 miles from greenwood. my dad pulled into the median in front of the burger king and he and i got out of the car and looked up.

a large triangular craft slowly floated over us. size in feet is hard for me to estimate and it's been a little while since this happened. i don't want my memory to inflate the measurement, but it was definitely larger than your average low-flying plane. if the sun had been out, it would have cast a shadow that would have covered me, my dad and his suv. it was like something out of an "unsolved mysteries" reenactment. 

the craft was black and the corners of the triangle were rounded. there were lights at each corner which i believe were bluish-white and a red light on each of the three sides between the bluish-white lights. it didn't make any sound at all and it floated at an even pace right over the tops of the pine trees. it seemed to be so close to the tops of the trees that i thought it might brush them as it passed over.

i know very little about military aircraft, but i looked up photos of stealth fighters later to see if i could find what we saw. it wasn't a b-2, i'm sure of it, because b-2s have a w-shape in the back and what we saw was a solid triangle. it wasn't a nighthawk either. both of those planes are too angular. i'm absolutely certain the corners of the triangle were rounded. 

my dad and i just stood there looking at it. i wasn't afraid, but i was intrigued. it was fascinating. time seemed to move really slowly, not for any metaphysical reason but because i couldn't believe what was i seeing. i wanted to pull it back and look at it some more. when it passed over -- it didn't shoot off at warp 9 or anything, it just floated over the trees and out of sight -- my dad and i got back in the car. less than a minute elapsed between the time we stopped the car and the time we got back in. i asked him what we had just seen and he said he didn't know, which surprised me because he's always been interested in military technology. we didn't talk much until we got home. we haven't discussed it since.
content.summary: Three witnesses saw a black triangular mystery craft silently pass over highway 25 in ware shoals, s.C. on a clear night on nov. 25, 2005.

content.detailedDescription: I was lying on my back in my backyard with sunglasses on.  it was partly cloudy.  i was looking directly up in the sky and i noticed a round object moving slowly from south to north.  it was a glowing red sphere approx 1/8" between my thumb and forefinger.  it moved, slowed briefly, paused, began moving again and then disappeared.  i continued looking in the sky and it reppeared about 10 seconds later, however it had changed its direction completely moving from east to west.  it was still glowing a bright red and may have been pulsing.  as it moved it turned a brilliant white and then disappeared after a couple of seconds. if it were on land you could say it was traveling about 1-2 miles per hour. at first, i thought it might be a balloon because it was spherical in shape and moved kind of lazily across the sky.  i changed my mind the second time i saw it when it took a path totally perpendicular to its original path.  also, the second time i saw it it turned to a bright white, which i decided a balloon couldn't manage.  i called to my father-in-law who was inside the house to come out and look.  we both looked up in the sky for about 10 more minutes, but never saw it again.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: glowing red sphere moving slowly in the sky, disappearing and changing direction

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to my home in southbury ct after working the 3-11 shift. it was a cold, clear night and i was proceeding down a windy country road when i noticed 4 bright, white lights at about 2,000 ft elevation, pacing the speed of my car at about 45 mph, off to my left. i rolled down the window but didn't hear any sound. i initially thought that it must be a helicopter. i pulled over at the nearest driveway and got out of the car. the object continued moving north for about a half mile, stopped, turned around on a dime and disappeared in an instant. no craft that i was aware of could fly at such a slow speed without making a lot of noise. the lights did not flash or blink; they were constant with the leading light seeming brighter than the trailing 3 lights. years later, i saw a report of an incident that took place in belgium in which the craft seemed very similar.
content.summary: Only saw 4 lights defining a triangular shape

content.detailedDescription:
It was ten pm, and i was taking my trash out to the curb.  i stopped to look up at the stars which were very bright that night. there were no clouds in the sky and it was very dark out, making the stars really stick out.  i didn't take notice right away, because i was looking at all the stars.  then i saw it in the northwest, and it looked like three stars that made up a diagonal line. i stared at it, trying to figure out what it was, and then as quick as you could blink your eye, the shape changed to a diamond shape, made of 4 star-like objects. it stayed that way for 2-3 seconds, then it changed again.  the last shape it took almost reminded me of a wrist, with three fingers. it stayed in one general area of the sky.  i am not sure how many star-like objects made up the last shape, but know it must have been at least 9 of them to make this shape. it went back to the diagonal shape, then the diamond shape, then this shape a few times, and was still changing when i went back into the house.
    /
--- --
    \
something similiar to that.   i did not see it changing---it just changed.  there were no trails, or any evidence at all of it's previous shape. it was almost like lights that turned off and on to make shapes, but they didn't look like lights.  they looked just like stars.  i know stars don't act like this, so i knew it had to be something else.

it was cold and windy that night, and i was cold, so i hurried back into the house.  the star-like objects were still changing shape when i went back in the house at 10:10 pm.

i did not take photos because my camera doesn't take good photos of stars.  i've tried many times before to photograph the moon and stars, but they don't show up well, so i didn't even attempt to get my camera.
content.summary: Several star-like objects changing shape

content.detailedDescription:
At 1:12 pm, february 24, 2006, an unidentified flying object was sighted over the city of albuquerque. the object was seen from a vehicle traveling southbound on yale. the object appeared to be disk shaped and light colored/semi-reflective (white/light silver). 

i am a pilot so i know and recognize most types of aircraft. this object appeared to be 1/4 mile north of my position and approximately 750-1,000 feet in elevation. at that distance, it appeared to be slightly larger than an f-15 (which we commonly see here). the object, i believed was going to approach our location as the airport was nearby. i was very curious to see the object closer so i could identify it as it was very strange looking.

however, the object didn't appear to be moving in our direction. possibly moving slowly and laterally. after about 15 seconds, it began to travel away from us (north) at an incredible speed. it became a distant point before disappearing out of sight after about 7 seconds.

i was in the back of a car watching this object. i first noticed it when looking out the back window and it caught my eye. i turned around and focused directly on it as i had no idea what it was and wanted to see what it was going to do. i did not get the attention of the driver as it would require her to completly turn around which was impossible as she was driving a vehicle. the front passenger would not have seen it well, if at all, because she would need to have been in the back seat to be oriented well enough to see the object out the back window. additionally, i did not want to take my eyes off the object to get another person's attention.

weather conditions were calm and clear. no other air traffic was in the immediate area.
content.summary: Unusual object over albuquerque, nm that sped away at incredible speed

content.detailedDescription: It was a boring day of travel on the interstate;looking around and enjoying the sorroundings.And then i notice a mirror like image in the sky...It was as if it were invisable but could see it .....It may have been reflecting its souroundings....Who knows? but 1 thing is 4 sure ...Both of us cant be wrong and i dont care if any one believes me or not ....I know what we seen...And that is final.Looked nothing like what u see on tv.Very strange in deed....And it was gone in a blink of an eye..When i said 2 my brother in law do u see that ..What is that; we were in awww...And then it was gone in a blink
content.summary: Mirror like image as if it was reflecting or taking in the suns energy.No paticular shape;just shiny.Another person was with me and witnessed the same thing.

content.detailedDescription:
1. at home, trying to sleep, then looking out of the roof-window
2. strange object moving on a sky, clearly visible through the window
3. laser projection from a nearby dico, but it was definitely not that
4. triangle frame, with three round shapes on the joints, looking like the top of the tree of sefirot (kabbala), surrounded by kind of tunic, all delicately lighten in red or orange shades. object was moving from south to north without noise, apparently not very high, or being very large.
5. opening the window, assuring that it was not any light reflection then amusement and kind of fear and anxiety.
6. it flew away in its direction
content.summary: Triangle frame with three ball-shapes, moving south to north

content.detailedDescription: I was talking to my friends it flew above me and it was horrible!Theres a pitture of it

content.detailedDescription: Every day i walk around my horse pasture (5 acres) with my dog. there is always lots of air traffic almost every day. i carry my camera with me and take pictures when things look interesting to me in the sky. a week does not pass that i don't catch something anomalous in one or several of the photos. i am sending the untouched original and an enhanced photo. the camera was pointed in a ne direction.I have caught this particular object a couple of times previous to this report and one was on a clear day with no clouds and no airplane activity.
content.summary: Taking pictures of sky activity and found this in the photo.

content.detailedDescription:
this has been going on since 2001.  my kids,  and i have been followed thru two states by different aliens some human looking,  draconian with wings.  white reptoid,  greys,  human looking blonds,  dark reptoids,  ghostly type.  men in black.  

   they have been doing experiments on me to advance my abilities to complete a mission of importance.  that would connect to ishtar, isis,  and jesus,  and god.

    since i have the capability to have a long memory i have the power to control mind control against our visitors.  my mission is of great importance to planet earth.  i am the reincarnation of a connection to one of our godly visitors.  i have the sould of what seems to be of a highly advanced extraterrestrial.

    they come to me every day.  i do not drink, smoke,  or take drugs.  have not done any narcotics at all.  i have met my human looking alien father in the flesh once,  and three times thru high tech methods.
content.summary: Not human visitor visitors.  i have been visited by aliens for quite some time.  aliens of many sorts because they believe me to be a star seed with advanced abilities

content.detailedDescription:
1. my sister, my seven year old son and i were driving on topanga canyon boulevard in the hills above chatsworth.
2. it was blocking the road.
3. a vortex.
4. it hovered about a foot off the road about twenty feet in front of us. when it disappeared, it just closed up, like a cat's eye but closing from side to side.
5. my son and sister screamed. my son dove behind the driver's seat to hide, and my sister and i froze.
6. see number 4 above. i don't remember the ride home. we left around 1pm, it's a 20 minute ride, but when i got home it was dark. my sister would never discuss the event with me. that was the last time i saw her sane. she developed schizophrenia and bipolar condition.
content.summary: 30' across, swirling red, yellow, orange, like burning but not consumed, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
-object in night sky over southern california
-triangle shaped - brilliant small lights on one side of object - lights changed from bright white to red and every color in between (full spectrum of lights came from this object!)
-moved from being over huntington beach (my guess) to being over long beach (also my guess) in approx. 1 hour and 20 minutes.
-at arms length, the object could have been hidden from view if i would have held up a dime.

how the sighting happened:
i went out on my back patio at 12:02 am pst to have a smoke and noticed a very bright light in the night sky. originally i kind-of assumed it was a star but after watching this object for a couple of minutes i realized that stars do not change color from an extremely bright white/halogen blue to a brilliant red and seemingly every color in between... this thing was amazing and so bright!! i ran inside and grabbed a monocular that i have and ran back outside to 'get a closer view'... what i saw when i looked through the monocular was a little blurry at first (the monocular doesn't have the best range) but after stabalizing my arm and focusing on the object, the lights seemed to be shaped like a triangle (many small lights making up a triangle shape) and the object was kind-of pulsing. i was in dis belief!! this couldn't really be happening!! i always watch the sky and until this night... i have never seen anything that i couldn't associate with some type of known object (star, plane or helicopter). after i was able to see some shape to the lights, i attempted to contact a friend who lives about 2 miles from me (i felt it was very important to have another witness - especially from a different angle then my view)... but he did not answer...

i watched this object for 1 hour and 21 minutes until it eventually moved behind a building and was no longer visible to me. during the last 8 minutes of the sighting, the object literally completely disappeared from visibility for about 2 seconds at a time on four occasions!! i would describe it as either rotating and therefore the lit side of the triangle was not visible or the lights on this object simply dimmed out completely... but the object was never completely dark for more then about two seconds. i verbally said "oh my god" when the object first disappeared from sight completely and then re-appeared two seconds later... it was absolutely unbelievable!

i took 5 images with my nikon coolpix 3.2 mega pixel digital camera but only one of the photos came out somewhat decent (attached to this report).

i really want to know if any other people saw this object and what thier description is... my monocular isn't the best so hopefully the triangle shape i saw was not a trick of lighting or caused by the distance.

thank you for being here to take this report!! i feel absolutely blessed to have been a witness to this amazing object!!

david arnold
costa mesa, ca
content.summary: Saw strange 'light' in sky... with binnoculars, it was a triangle with many small lights on the 'bottom surface' - this thing glowed brilliantly (every color)!!
